column3: UCL Great Ormond Street Institute of Child Health
column5: Register your interest in graduate study at UCLThis programme integrates the clinical, academic and research components of neurophysiotherapy practice, with an emphasis on the management of patients with neurological disorders. You will develop an understanding of evidence-based practice and develop as an advanced physiotherapy practitioner. You will be able to select from a wide range of modules according to your interest and complete at least one clinical placement.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time, 5 years flexible
